name: SHORT HAUL WIDEBODY FLIGHTS IN EUROPE! Turkish Boeing 777/ British Airways Boeing 767
description:
How can you take widebody flights in Europe?  Join me on this crazy adventure as I fly to Sofia, Bulgaria to fly on two widebody aircraft within Europe in one trip - the Turkish Airlines Boeing 777-300ER and the British Airways Boeing 767-300ER.

Thanks to World Aviation HD for the intro: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNrHXvor-NMvRqMpVxYDm8Q

ALL THE FULL FLIGHT VIDEOS FROM THIS TRIP COMING VERY SOON!  WATCH THEM FIRST AT http://inflightvideo.tv

PLEASE SUBSCRIBE!  http://inflightvideo.tv/subscribe

FACEBOOK: http://facebook.com/inflightvideo
INSTAGRAM: http://instagram.com/inflightvideo

FLIGHTS FEATURED
Turkish Airlines Boeing 777-300ER - London to Istanbul
Turkish Airlines Boeing 737-800 - Istanbul to Sofia
Lufthansa Airbus A320 - Sofia to Munich
Helvetic Fokker 100 - Munich to Zurich
British Airways Boeing 767-300ER - Zurich to London
